Rainy_Day_0: Finally... some heavy rain. I get bored of sunny weather easily.
Rainy_Day_1: Hey. I was just thinking about my old room in the basement. I felt comfortable there, but this is a lot more interesting. And I don't miss the smell...#$e#I felt kind of embarrassed living in my mom's house for so long.
Rainy_Day_2: Hey. I couldn't sleep last night so I took a walk to the caves. I found this... want it?[575 769 767 84 66 78]#$e#I just have trouble sleeping sometimes, it has nothing to do with you. I love you.$7
Rainy_Day_3: Seems like a pretty good day to just lay around, maybe read a book or something... what do you think?
Rainy_Day_4: Hey, another rainy day... perfect.#$e#You look cold... here, come closer.$l
Rainy_Night_0: I'm trying my best to quit smoking now that we're married... I don't wanna die on you. It's a bad habit.#$e#I want to have a future together.$l
patio_Sebastian: Need something? I'll just be over here working on my bike for a while.
Rainy_Night_1: I did some work on the laptop today. I was actually brainstorming some ideas for a game I want to make.#$e#With your farming income, I can afford to do what I want with my life. It's pretty amazing. Thank you.$h
Rainy_Night_2: Sorry, I didn't make any dinner. We might have a frozen pizza in the fridge or something.#$e#I dunno, my mind was elsewhere. It's hard to remember to do chores...
Rainy_Night_3: How was your day? Did you slay any monsters?$h#$e#It feels good to take out your aggression now and then, doesn't it?
Rainy_Night_4: Maybe a witch will visit us tonight? Hah.. if only life was that interesting...
Indoor_Day_0: The older I get, the less I'm drawn to the city. It had a certain mystique to it, once. But it turns out that was just a romantic fantasy.#$e#The city's so busy, so full of people... I don't belong there. I'm a loner.
Indoor_Day_1: Hey... want some coffee?[395]$7#$e#I needed some... woke up early from a nightmare and I just couldn't fall back asleep.
Indoor_Day_2: I couldn't sleep last night so I went for a night ride on the motorcycle.#$e#I need to stay independent, even though we're married. That's just how I am. I still love you, though.$7
Indoor_Day_3: Hey. How'd you sleep last night? I heard you mumbling.#$e#You seemed scared, but I have to admit... it was kind of cute.$l
Indoor_Day_4: Living here with you is teaching me to come out of my shell a little bit. I think it's good for me.$7
Indoor_Night_0: Hey. I just hung out around the house, today. Nothing interesting...#$e#...#$e#The view from our house is perfect. You can see the sun setting over Pelican Town from the front porch.
Indoor_Night_1: Maybe I drank too much coffee... I don't feel very tired.#$e#I'm still trying to adjust to the farm schedule. I used to stay up until 5am and sleep in until 2pm, sometimes.$h
Indoor_Night_2: It's really cool to have our own place. I can do whatever I feel like and not have people nagging at me all the time.#$e#I'm sure Maru's happy that I'm gone.
Indoor_Night_3: I spotted a bat out the window earlier. It's kind of hard to see, but if you stay focused you can often catch them flittering about. They're out there.
Indoor_Night_4: I often felt unappreciated back home... but here I feel like I really belong. Thanks for making me feel welcome, @.$l
Outdoor_0: I feel like I want to do something today... but I'm not sure what. Do you ever have that problem, @?
Outdoor_1: Hmm... sometimes I have to force myself to stay outside for health.#$e#I dunno what it is, but I like being indoors. Maybe I'm just so used to my dark basement.
Outdoor_2: I'll just watch you from here.$h#$e#I enjoy watching you.
Outdoor_3: I don't want to get soft now that I'm a married guy. Maybe I should start eating more hot pepper and working out?#$e#Just an idea...$h
Outdoor_4: We should raise more slimes... In big quantities they can be pretty profitable. And they're so easy to raise.#$e#Also, different colored slimes produce different items. I dunno, I think it'd be kind of a fun hobby for us.
OneKid_0: I'm still getting used to being a father. Don't worry, I'll take good care of %kid1! It's just... something new.
OneKid_1: Maybe when %kid1 is a little older, I'll get a sidecar for the bike and we can all go for a ride.$h
OneKid_3: Have you smelled %kid1? Maybe it's time for a bath...
TwoKids_0: Don't worry, I already fed the kids... %kid2 spilled the chocolate milk all over my shirt again.
TwoKids_1: I hope %kid1 and %kid2 are nice to each other. Maru and I always fought as kids.#$e#If I think back on it, it was mostly my fault...
TwoKids_2: I've had this recurring dream that %kid2 is wearing a shadow shaman costume and sitting on a glowing pumpkin. Weird, huh?
TwoKids_3: We've come a long way, @. Look at our family. To be honest, I never really thought I'd end up in this situation.#$e#Now that I'm here, I like it...$l
Good_0: Hey. Look at me. Never forget that I love you... you're everything to me.$l#$b#Now go make us some money.$h
Good_1: Hey... come here. You look great today.$l
Good_2: You always look great, even after slopping around in the yard all day.$l
Good_3: I don't often show it, but I'm really happy that I'm your husband. Marrying you was the best decision I ever made.$l
Good_4: You don't ever have to worry about me. I like to spend a lot of time alone.
Good_5: Sometimes I feel so angry... but when you show up I always start to calm down.$7#$e#Maybe I'll mellow out with age.
Good_6: I know you're tough, but I still worry about you, sometimes. Don't ever go monster hunting without a life elixir and some sturdy boots, okay?
Good_8: I don't really feel like doing work today. Maybe I'll see what's on TV.
Good_9: I don't really need friends. You're the only person I need in my life. Is that weird?#$e#I guess I'm not like most people.
Neutral_0: When I take walks I do my best to avoid everyone. I hate being pressured into small talk.
Neutral_2: Why don't you tell me about your day when we're in bed tonight? I'm kind of busy right now...
Neutral_3: Are you going into town today? Why, what are you up to?
Neutral_4: I guess I can do the laundry today... You probably have your hands full with running the farm.
Neutral_5: Are we doing okay on money? I don't want to have to sell my laptop...
Neutral_6: If you need to go see your friends in town, go ahead. I like being alone, anyways.
Neutral_8: House-cleaning isn't fun, but when I listen to music and it goes by pretty fast.
Bad_5: Look, I just want to be alone. Why don't you go outside and do your own thing for a while?
Bad_6: What do you want? You sound like my step-dad. Go away.$a
Bad_7: This place is starting to feel like a tomb.$s
Bad_8: I started smoking again... I've just been really stressed out lately.$s
funLeave_Sebastian: I'm going to take a walk today. I need some time to myself. I'll see you in the evening.
funReturn_Sebastian: My day was fine, nothing much to tell you about. Why don't you tell me about yours?
spring_1: Oohh... my head. Happy new year...$h
spring_12: Are you excited for tomorrow's festival? It'll be good to see Fin again.
spring_23: Oh... tomorrow's the flower dance, isn't it? Do we have to go?#$e#I hate wearing that ridiculous tight jumpsuit. Why does Lewis make us do this?$s
summer_1: Summer's here... I need to start slathering the sunscreen pretty thick if I want to maintain my pale complexion...
summer_10: Have you thought about what you're going to put in the luau soup?#$e#I have no idea what's good... you're the chef!$7
summer_27: The weather's starting to cool off. It feels great.#$e#Should we go to the festival tomorrow night? It's actually a tradition I kind of enjoy.$7
fall_1: It seems like the whole valley's changed overnight... I guess fall's finally here.
fall_15: The Stardew Valley Fair is a little crowded for my tastes... but I'll just hang out with Fin. It'll be good to catch up with him.#$e#You should play some carnival games, though! Don't worry about me.$7
fall_26: I'm excited for the Spirit's Eve tomorrow. I wonder what horrors we'll find there.$h
winter_1: What are your plans this winter? I know it's more of a laid-back time for you.
winter_7: Are you going to enter the fishing contest tomorrow?
winter_28: It's been a great year, @. We should celebrate a little. [346]$h#$e#I'm sure next year will be even better.$7
